friction: Operational exports in CargoWise (Universal XML/CSV) do not align with NetSuite's strict Journal Entry or Bill schemas.
solution: DocStandard normalizes CargoWise XML into NetSuite-aligned CSV/JSON files, mapping VAT, currency, and GL codes at the line level.

SOURCESYSTEM TARGETFIELDERP FIELDNORMALIZATION LOGIC

CargoWiseNetSuiteRESTlet JSONRESTlet.PayloadTransforms JSON keys to NetSuite field IDs; validates required fields.

CargoWiseNetSuiteShipment.DataContextTransaction.subsidiaryMaps CargoWise organization code to NetSuite subsidiary internal ID.

LogisticsSAP S/4HANAE1EDP01.POSEXLineItemNumberExtracts line item position number.
LogisticsSAP S/4HANAE1EDP01.MATNRMaterialNumberValidates material numbers against master data.

friction: Source logistics systems produce flat files or JSON that don't align with Oracle ERP Cloud's FBDI (File-Based Data Import) templates and REST API schemas for AP Invoice processing.
solution: DocStandard transforms logistics output into Oracle-compliant FBDI files and REST payloads, handling InvoiceHeader, InvoiceLine, and Supplier field mappings with automatic validation.
technicalData:
SOURCESYSTEM TARGETFIELDERP FIELDNORMALIZATION LOGIC
MercuryGateOracle ERP CloudInvoiceHeader.InvoiceNumberAP_INVOICES_INTERFACE.INVOICE_NUMMaps MG invoice numbers to Oracle AP interface; validates uniqueness.
MercuryGateOracle ERP CloudInvoiceHeader.InvoiceDateAP_INVOICES_INTERFACE.INVOICE_DATETransforms to Oracle format YYYY-MM-DD; validates against open periods.
MercuryGateOracle ERP CloudInvoiceHeader.VendorNumAP_INVOICES_INTERFACE.VENDOR_NUMResolves against Oracle supplier master; creates vendor if not exists.
MercuryGateOracle ERP CloudInvoiceHeader.InvoiceAmountAP_INVOICES_INTERFACE.INVOICE_AMOUNTValidates sum of line items matches header total.
MercuryGateOracle ERP CloudInvoiceLine.LineTypeAP_INVOICE_LINES_INTERFACE.LINE_TYPE_LOOKUP_CODEMaps ITEM/FREIGHT/MISCELLANEOUS to Oracle lookup codes.
MercuryGateOracle ERP CloudInvoiceLine.LineAmountAP_INVOICE_LINES_INTERFACE.AMOUNTPosts with proper sign for debits/credits; validates GL account.
MercuryGateOracle ERP CloudInvoiceLine.DistributionAccountAP_INVOICE_LINES_INTERFACE.DIST_CODE_CONCATENATEDMaps to Oracle accounting flexfield structure (Company-Dept-Account-Product).
MercuryGateOracle ERP CloudCharge.FuelSurchargeAP_INVOICE_LINES_INTERFACE.LINE_TYPE=FREIGHTSeparates fuel charges to distinct freight lines with separate GL mapping.
MercuryGateOracle ERP CloudCharge.AccessorialAP_INVOICE_LINES_INTERFACE.LINE_TYPE=MISCELLANEOUSRoutes accessorials to miscellaneous lines with charge code descriptions.
3PL CentralOracle ERP CloudWarehouseReceipt.ReceiptNumberAP_INVOICES_INTERFACE.INVOICE_NUMGenerates 3PL invoice number from receipt data with vendor prefix.
3PL CentralOracle ERP CloudBilling.ChargeCodeAP_INVOICE_LINES_INTERFACE.DESCRIPTIONMaps 3PL charge codes (storage, handling, etc.) to line descriptions.
3PL CentralOracle ERP CloudBilling.AmountAP_INVOICE_LINES_INTERFACE.AMOUNTAggregates charges by type; validates against rate card if configured.
CargoWiseOracle ERP CloudUniversalShipment.XMLFBDI.ZIPConverts CW XML to FBDI format with APInvoiceHeader and APInvoiceLine CSVs.
CargoWiseOracle ERP CloudJob.JobNumberAP_INVOICES_INTERFACE.INVOICE_NUMPrefixes job number with CW identifier for Oracle uniqueness.
CargoWiseOracle ERP CloudChargeLine.ChargeCodeAP_INVOICE_LINES_INTERFACE.DESCRIPTIONMaps CW charge codes to Oracle descriptions via transformation table.
CargoWiseOracle ERP CloudChargeLine.ChargeAmountAP_INVOICE_LINES_INTERFACE.AMOUNTConverts CW currency amounts to Oracle ledger currency.
Source SystemsOracle ERP CloudFBDI.Template/oracle/apps/ess/financials/payables/invoices/transactions/Generates FBDI ZIP with .properties file for APXIIMPT job submission.
Source SystemsOracle ERP CloudREST.APIfusion/rest/11.1.13.18.05/invoiceValidationSubmits invoices via REST for real-time validation before import.
Source SystemsOracle ERP CloudSupplier.SupplierIdAP_INVOICES_INTERFACE.VENDOR_IDValidates supplier exists in Oracle; triggers notification if missing.
Source SystemsOracle ERP CloudSupplier.SiteIdAP_INVOICES_INTERFACE.VENDOR_SITE_IDMaps to correct vendor site for payment processing.
Source SystemsOracle ERP CloudInvoice.TermsNameAP_INVOICES_INTERFACE.TERMS_NAMEValidates payment terms against Oracle lookup; defaults if not found.

friction: Logistics systems generate operational data that requires precise IDoc segment ordering and BAPI parameter mapping for SAP S/4HANA's strict /SCMTMS/ and /SCMWM/ integration requirements.
solution: DocStandard delivers properly structured IDocs with correct segment sequences and BAPI calls for Transportation Management (TM) and Warehouse Management (WM), ensuring seamless SAP S/4HANA integration.
technicalData:
SOURCESYSTEM TARGETFIELDERP FIELDNORMALIZATION LOGIC
Motive (ELD)SAP S/4HANATrip.TripId/SCMTMS/TOR_D_ROOT-DB_KEYMaps Motive trip ID to SAP TM transportation order database key.
Motive (ELD)SAP S/4HANAVehicle.VIN/SCMTMS/TOR_D_ROOT-TSP_IDResolves VIN to transportation service provider ID in SAP TM.
Motive (ELD)SAP S/4HANADriver.DriverId/SCMTMS/TOR_D_ROOT-ASSIGNED_DRIVERMaps driver ID to assigned driver field in transportation order.
Motive (ELD)SAP S/4HANALocation.GPSCoordinates/SCMTMS/TOR_D_STOP-LOG_LOC_DATAConverts GPS to SAP location format for stop updates.
Motive (ELD)SAP S/4HANAEvent.EventType/SCMTMS/TOR_D_EXEC-EXEC_EVENT_CODEMaps ELD events (arrival, departure) to SAP TM execution events.
Motive (ELD)SAP S/4HANAIFTA.MilesByJurisdictionBAPI_ACC_DOCUMENT_POST-GL_ACCOUNTPosts IFTA mileage to appropriate tax liability GL accounts.
Manhattan WMSSAP S/4HANADelivery.DeliveryId/SCMWM/ORDIM_C-DELIV_NOMaps Manhattan delivery to SAP EWM inbound delivery number.
Manhattan WMSSAP S/4HANAHandlingUnit.HUId/SCMWM/HU_HDR-HU_IDCreates or updates handling unit in SAP EWM with Manhattan data.
Manhattan WMSSAP S/4HANAInventory.Quantity/SCMWM/ORDIM_C-QTYPosts received quantities to SAP EWM inbound delivery items.
Manhattan WMSSAP S/4HANATask.PickTaskId/SCMWM/ORDIM_O-ORDIM_NOMaps Manhattan pick tasks to SAP EWM outbound delivery orders.
Manhattan WMSSAP S/4HANAMovement.MovementType/SCMWM/TO_C-TO_TYPEDetermines warehouse transfer order type based on movement.
BlueYonder TMSSAP S/4HANAShipment.ShipmentId/SCMTMS/TOR_D_ROOT-TOR_IDMaps BY shipment to SAP TM transportation order ID.
BlueYonder TMSSAP S/4HANAShipment.CarrierSCAC/SCMTMS/TOR_D_ROOT-TSPResolves SCAC code to transportation service provider in SAP.
BlueYonder TMSSAP S/4HANAStop.StopSequence/SCMTMS/TOR_D_STOP-STOP_KEYMaintains stop sequence for multi-stop shipment routing.
BlueYonder TMSSAP S/4HANAStop.ArrivalTime/SCMTMS/TOR_D_STOP-AGGR_TIME_WINDOW_FROMMaps planned arrival to SAP time window constraints.
BlueYonder TMSSAP S/4HANACharge.FreightCost/SCMTMS/TOR_D_CHRG-CHRG_ELEMENT_VALPosts freight charges to SAP TM charge elements.
CargoWiseSAP S/4HANAUniversalShipment.ShipmentIDoc.SHPMNTTransforms CW shipment to SHPMNT IDoc with proper segment ordering.
CargoWiseSAP S/4HANAE1EDT20.TKNUMShipmentNumberPopulates IDoc shipment header with CW shipment reference.
CargoWiseSAP S/4HANAE1EDL20.VBELNDelivery.VL03NLinks to existing SAP delivery or creates new via BAPI.
CargoWiseSAP S/4HANAE1EDL24.MATNRMaterial.MARAValidates SKU against SAP material master; creates if not exists.
CargoWiseSAP S/4HANAE1EDL24.LFIMGDeliveryQuantityPosts quantities in base UOM with proper decimal handling.
BAPI ProcessingSAP S/4HANABAPI_SHIPMENT_CREATEShipmentAPICreates shipments with header, stages, and items.
BAPI ProcessingSAP S/4HANABAPI_OUTB_DELIVERY_CREATEDeliveryAPIPosts outbound deliveries with batch and HU handling.
BAPI ProcessingSAP S/4HANABAPI_BILLINGDOC_CREATEMULTIPLEBillingAPIGenerates billing documents from freight charges.
BAPI ProcessingSAP S/4HANABAPI_ACC_DOCUMENT_POSTFinancialPostingPosts freight costs to GL accounts with cost center allocation.
Error HandlingSAP S/4HANAIDoc.StatusWE02/WE05/BD87Monitors IDoc status; reprocesses errors automatically.
Error HandlingSAP S/4HANABAPI.RETURNMessageLogCaptures BAPI return messages for audit and troubleshooting.
